subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Officials from Oakland, San Diego and St. Louis made a case for keeping their teams from moving on Wednesday, the same day Disney’s chief executive joined the Chargers-Raiders’ stadium project.
snippet: Officials from Oakland, San Diego and St. Louis made a case for keeping their teams from moving on Wednesday, the same day Disney’s chief executive joined the Chargers-Raiders’ stadium project.
